articles.author: Ali Sawafta, Mahmoud Issa, Hussam El Masri
articles.description: Overwhelmed doctors and patients at Gaza's largest medical centre could soon be plunged into darkness because of dwindling fuel supplies, which doctors say threaten to paralyze Al Shifa hospital as Israel presses on with its military campaign.
articles.title: Fuel shortage threatens to turn Gaza's biggest hospital into graveyard, doctors say
